channel.title: Compile issue
channel.description:
I downloaded a 525 HD client, but i'm having some problems with the compiler when I downloaded the client the compiler looked like this.
@echo off cd src javac . -d ../bin *.java pause
Could someone please write the compiler for me?
[b]Java[/b] C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05 C:\Program Files\Java\jre8
[b]Thank you![/b]

item.title: Compile issue
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

@echo off cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05\bin\javac.exe" . -d ../bin *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compile issue
item.dc:creator: @leoni3545 leoni3545
item.description:
@leoni3545 wrote:

try this

@echo off
cd …
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05\bin\javac.exe"
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compile issue
item.dc:creator: @petterrs96 petterrs96
item.description:
@petterrs96 wrote:

I downloaded a 525 HD client, but i’m having some problems with the compiler
when I downloaded the client the compiler looked like this.

@echo off
cd src
javac . -d …/bin *.java
pause

Could someone please write the compiler for me?

Java
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05
C:\Program Files\Java\jre8

Thank you!
